page.title: 20MORETON DOMESDAY RESEARCHERS
page.content:
This project was carried out by 7 children aged 10-11 years. Several Mums helped to transport us round our survey area. We started our survey by drawing large scale maps of each block. { {PAULA WHITE & CAROLINE WALLACE}visited Norma's Cattery,Collins' Farm & interviewed Rev P.Turner. {EMMA WAKEFIELD & VICTORIA FIELD } visited Enville's Farm & the Moreton Massey Public House. {CHARLOTTE COX, MICHAEL DAVIS & ANDREW {BLOWES}visited Binder's, Dalgety's,and Steele's.They also interviewed staff and children about the school.
We have all enjoyed learning a great deal about our area, and we hope you do too.
